segment.target: This planet is partially covered in forest.
This planet is made up of swamps and foul-smelling mud pits.
This planet is made up of desert plains. Arid, dry and hostile.
An almost infinite expanse of wetness.
This planet is riddled with dark, humid caves.
A herd of ruminants detected (or some other form of animal to snack on...).
Advanced form of intelligent life detected.
Warning: An enormous beast (known for devouring players one by one) has been detected.
Presence of oxygen detected in the atmosphere.
The temperature is relatively low, and could have a negative effect on the expedition.
The temperature is relatively high, which could have a negative effect on the expedition.
Strong winds are sweeping the planet.
Presence of ruins from an ancient civilization detected.
Presence of an unknown wreck detected.
Presence of other Daedalus crewmates detected.
Zone with elevated crystalite concentration detected.
